forum.content:
Hi everyone! My name is Chantel and I am pleasantly surprised to chance upon this forum to find people who can speak or keen to speak English. I'm here in Taiwan for almost a year.... will be great to make more friends who I could converse in English.

Have a great day~ Catch up soon~


大家好, 我是Chantel. 竟然讓我找到這個群組, 真的是很開心。我來台灣差不多要一年了, 很期待可以多認識會講英語和有興趣多講的朋友~

祝你們有個美好的一天~
forum.title: Happy to know this English forum group
